name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: StackMind.AI - Intelligent ChatGPT History Organizer & Search

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage ChatGPT chat history, organize folders, search conversations, and keep data private.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly manage your ChatGPT chat history and boost productivity with StackMind.AI. Automatically create and organize folders in the left menu, search ChatGPT conversations instantly, and keep your data private.

üóÇÔ∏è Magic Chats Organizer: Automatically create and organize folders for your ChatGPT conversations, saving hours of manual work.
üìÇ Customizable Folder Structure: Create and manage custom folders for your ChatGPT conversations. Organize your chats your way, with all data stored locally under your control.
üìåConversation Pinning: Instantly access your most important chats by pinning them to the top of your history. Highlight key discussions, save crucial information, and never lose track of essential conversations again.
üîç AI-Search: Go beyond scanning and explore the full content of your conversations. Transform your history into a powerful resource of knowledge.

How does it work?
StackMind.AI leverages advanced AI to analyze patterns across your ChatGPT conversations and automatically organizes them into a structured folder system. This intelligent sorting saves you the time and effort of manually categorizing your chats.
Key Points:
- AI-Powered Organization: Our AI scans your ChatGPT conversations to identify themes and patterns, fitting them into relevant folders automatically.
- Efficient Search: Use the sidebar button or hotkey (‚å®Ô∏è Ctrl-Shift-P) to quickly search through your indexed conversations.
By transforming your conversation history into an organized and easily navigable resource, StackMind.AI enhances your productivity and workflow.

Why do I need it?
Currently, ChatGPT does not offer an efficient way to find old chats other than manually scrolling. If you have numerous chats and regularly need to find specific discussions, StackMind.AI is perfect for you.
Does it search the contents of chats?
Yes, it indexes both chat names and messages. You can search for any word or phrase mentioned in your chats. After installation, please allow some time for the initial index fetching. Chat names are retrieved immediately, but messages may take a few minutes.

Maximize your productivity by seamlessly managing and searching your ChatGPT history with StackMind.AI. Enjoy organized workflows, private data handling, and intelligent conversation management. üåü

For any support or inquiries, please contact us at: support@stackmind.ai
